about_the_game:
.

Femdom Game World - is a fascinating series of video games, the story centers on strong and sexy women who exercise dominance over men and more. In these games, players are immersed in a world where female domination reigns in all aspects of relationships, providing a unique gaming experience. Experience an exciting world of lust and depravity at Femdom Game World."



Story:

The main character is a young guy named Mark. He studies at an art institute and lives with his mom, dreaming of becoming independent sooner rather than later. Jessica - Mark's mother - is an extravagant woman who has no weakness for family life and social customs, likes to spend her life in celebration, often changing jobs, places of residence and men. Over time, their relationship became more trusting, the Protagonist was waiting for the opportunity to become financially independent and leave. Until one day he began to catch himself thinking that he was looking at his mother and admiring her bossy character. And, strangely enough, Jessica reciprocated, becoming for her son a strict Mistress, whose orders must be carried out immediately.

You take on the role of Mark, living together with him a complex and confusing relationship with his mother. Every choice you make affects the development of the plot and the fate of the characters, revealing new twists and consequences. Your decisions can lead to different endings, making each playthrough unique.

Key Features:

Deep narrative: Immerse yourself in an intriguing story full of unexpected twists and secrets.
High-quality animations: Enjoy detailed and high-quality sex animations.
Cool soundtrack: Discover the atmosphere of the game with an emotionally rich soundtrack.

content_descriptors.notes:
WARNING!
This game is for ADULTS only and contains sexually explicit material that some viewers may find offensive. The game contains bondage, BDSM and incest. All characters shown in the game are over 18 years old.

name: Femdom Game World: Mom

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows XP or higher
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 or DirectX 9.0c compatible
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Femdom Game World: Mom is a visual novel with an in-depth story designed for an adult audience. You find yourself in the role of a young student who lives with his mom. He dreams of getting closer to her. And then one day the main character's mom becomes his Mistress.
